title: Biggest Youth Film Festival
content:
Hello Bengaluru
🥹If you are passionate about MUSIC,FILMS, ACTING or Curious of ART behind films.
You can't miss this Once a Year 🤌UNDER 25 FILM FESTIVAL
That is Ready to set fire🔥 on 9th of  December on Saturday at DSCE (P.C Sagar Auditorium)

🙌 Create a long relationship with Fellow Film,Music  Enthusiasts at the Event
✌️Get a chance to take your step on film career

🎉 Tickets Available at Discounted Price ₹399 only just for early birds
DM for a Discount 
👁️Discounted price is only valid for the 1st 10 people
Last date of registration for early birds is 29th November 11:00 am

comments.body: Bro like why it's not something related to pesu, like why on reddit??

removed it sir

love the spirit of PES xD
